testsuite.name: Tests for endpoint: GET /users?name=<name_input>

testcase.name: Users starting with "k" are retrieved in alphabetical order.
No Users are retrieved and no exception is thrown if the given name is not found.
Users starting with "ke" are retrieved in alphabetical order.
All Users are retrieved in alphabetical order when no name is given.
No Users are retrieved and ErrorCode for invalid query character is returned if the name contains an invalid character.
